## Color4.copyFromFloats() method

Copies the given float values into the current one

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
copyFromFloats(r: number, g: number, b: number, a: number): Color4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  r | <code>number</code> | defines the red component to read from |
|  g | <code>number</code> | defines the green component to read from |
|  b | <code>number</code> | defines the blue component to read from |
|  a | <code>number</code> | defines the alpha component to read from |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Color4`

the current updated Color4 object
